description: Executable that runs scmanager to change the target binary of a service remotely. Good with a CIFS ticket.

customAttributes.name: targetService
customAttributes.description: Service on the target host that will have it's binary retargeted.

customAttributes.name: preCommand
customAttributes.description: A command to run in the context of the service before the malicious binary is added.

customAttributes.name: retargetServiceTo
customAttributes.description: The full path to the binary local to the target host that the service will be retargeted to.

customAttributes.name: compile
customAttributes.description: Whether or not to compile. Y/N

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of file to be created, can be full path or just a name
